message.content: Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. They outline five specific limitations of their framework and discuss potential future work to address these limitations. This includes issues related to convergence, regularizer effects, Hessians, energy properties, and generalization to different material parameters.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work in the "Limitations and Future Work" subsection. They outline five main limitations and provide explanations for each. This demonstrates their awareness of the weaknesses and areas of improvement in their research.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. They list five major limitations of their framework in the "Limitations and Future Work" section and provide a brief explanation of each limitation. This helps in understanding the current scope and potential areas for improvement in their research.
